markdownRemark.html:
RapiHogar is a local startup that allows people to quickly find professionals for common home problems. I created an intro wizard for workers to register their accounts. It handles offline data (redux-persist), forms, image uploads, signatures, API interacation and navigation. I also fixed some bugs by enforcing best practices, improving the app's overall performance. Improved code quality by adding standard ESLint configs.

Tech stack

Javascript (ES2015), React Native, Redux, Redux Saga, Redux Persist, React Navigation

Screenshots

URL

https://www.rapihogar.com.ar
